item.title: Godrej Tyson Foods introduces the delectable Galouti Kabab
item.description: Godrej Tyson Foods, a subsidiary of Godrej Agrovet, has introduced a Galouti Kabab under its rapidly expanding Godrej Yummiez brand. It’s worth noting that Godrej Yummiez primarily offers vegetarian products. Godrej Yummiez already holds a strong position in the kabab market with its chicken seekh kabab and Hariyali kabab options. By adding Galouti Kabab to its offerings, Godrej Yummiez aims to bring this delicacy from the royal kitchens of Lucknow to dining tables across India.
